title: Les Réincarnations du Père Ubu (1 Volume, 9 Introductory Pages, 1-212 Story Tables)
credit_line: Gift of Mr. and Mrs. Charles J. Rosenbloom
provenance_text:
Georges Rouault [1871-1958], France. Mr. [1898-1973] and Mrs. [1898-1992] Charles J. Rosenbloom, Pittsburgh, PA [1]; gift to Department of Fine Arts, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, 1956.

Notes: 
[1]. The Réincarnations volume was probably purchased by Mr. Rosenbloom from Charles Sessler, Philadelphia, PA on November 20, 1947. See copy of Sessler customer card for Mr. Rosenbloom in Charles Sessler Records, Collection 3205, The Historical Society of Pennsylvania, Philadelphia, PA.

Under review by CGK.
